Text: I totally agree.  you son must come first.  thanks for still putting up the post though I really appreciate it.  I hope your son is ok.
Thanks for upload. Hope your son's alright mate.
Must've been a struggle to look after the family and still manage to record this for us all.  Thanks for the effort.  Much appreciated.
Thanks!!! hope everything is alright with son

Son of course nr. 1.
I wish him a good recovery.
Thanks for putting MOTD up like clockwork.

Absolutley right...family first.

Best wishes to you and your boy

Thanks for the upload from an appreciative expat in the Middle East

Massive wishes of good health for your boy and your entire family from Warsaw, Poland.
People like you are jewels and gems of humanity and they should not struggle with any problems in their lifes. I don't have to mention you are a lifeline for all football lovers around the world and you sacrifice your time and efforts just to make other people happy.
Thanks again for your work and all the best!!!

Hey Pooloop. Is there any way of being able to upload these football matches in higher quality? I'd like to be able to make out faces and names on shirts when I watch the game, so I know who is who. I tried finding some HD football torrents but they all want you to pay for them.
I hope ur son is ok... greeting here from your avid and loyal fans in the philippines.
